questions.question: According to laws of vibrations of stretched strings, frequency of the fundamental node n is

answers.b: Directly proportional to the square root of tension

explanations.a: Frequency is inversely proportional to length for a stretched string.
explanations.b: Frequency increases with the square root of tension.
explanations.c: Frequency decreases with increasing linear density.
explanations.d: Correct — all of these are true based on the wave equation.

questions.question: The frequency of sound produced is lowest in

explanations.a: Harmonics are multiples of the fundamental.
explanations.c: Correct — fundamental frequency is the lowest.
